(6)~ maji(a) go up a stream in a vessel. (b) drink a lot of alcohol. (7)~ nakshicarve in wood or stone; (8)~ nguobuy a piece of cloth. (9)~ njiatake a shortcut. (10)~ tamaadespair. (11)~ rufaaappeal a court sentence. (12)~ urafikisaver friendly relations. (13)~ tikitibuy a ticket. (14)~ rohodie. (tde)katia; (tdk)katika; (tdn)katana; (tds)katisha; (tdw)katwa.

(Kar)
definitions: 1 cut, hew; mince, cut into pieces
2 amputate, dissociate (from), chop, lop, mutilate, cut off
(a) interrupt sb; (b) lose power of speech due to severe illness
(a) go up a stream in a vessel

zunguk.html: zunguk.akt[ele] 1 go round, surround, revolve. 2 wander about, loiter, stroll.(tde)zungukia; (tdk)zungukika; (tdn)zungukana; (tds)zungukisha; (tdw)zungukwa.

zuzu.html: zuzunm ma-[a-/wa-] imbecile, fool, idiot, blockhead, simp-leton.
zuzu.akt[sie] 1 disturb, derange. 2 infatuate, craze:ji~vaunt, flatter oneself. (tde)zuzulia; (tdk)zuzuka; (tdn)zuzuana;(tde)zuzusha,(tdw)zuzuliwa.
